text: Shining Through is the debut album from Pinoy Idol winner Gretchen Espina. The album was released on August 4, 2009 under Sony Music Philippines. ==Track listing== #"Shining Through" #"Kasalanan Nga Ba?" #"I Promise" #"Di Man Sabihin" #"Never in My Life" #"I Know You By Heart" #"One More Try" #"Pangako Sa 'Yo" #"To You" #"So Slow" #"Suntok Sa Buwan" #"Kasalanan Nga Ba? (R&B; Version)" ==External links== *Sony Music Philippines Category:2009 debut albums Category:Gretchen Espina albums
title: Shining Through (album)
